<lowercasetitle/>


This function gets the server ip.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="string">string getServerIp ( )</syntaxhighlight>

==Code==
<section name="Server" class="server" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
SERVER_IP = "127.0.0.1"

function getServerIp()
    return SERVER_IP
end

fetchRemote("http://checkip.dyndns.com/",
    function (response)
        if response ~= "ERROR" then
            SERVER_IP = response:match("<body>Current IP Address: (.-)</body>") or "127.0.0.1"
        end
    end
)
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>

==Example==
<section name="Server" class="server" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
outputServerLog("Public server IP: " .. getServerIp())
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
